resources.string: Your tape will taste best when the concentration of alcohol percentage reaches 6%.
Your tape will be in the best condition with the maximum temperature is 29 Degree Celsius.
We will notify you when we reach that point.
You can check it regularly by clicking on the Button beside!
Monitor your tape condition in real-time here!
Monitor your day-by-day tape progress here!
Click here to manually control the lamp in the storage, to adjust the temperature!

Note that your tape will be ready when the alcohol level reaches about 50%. To maintain the process, please keep the storage temperature at around 29 to 32 Degree Celsius. This whole process will take about three to five days, TapeKu will notify you when everything is ready!
With this TapeKu App, you can monitor your tape condition efficiently.
